data.hsem_energi_data_service_import: Energy Data Service Import Price Sensor

data_description.hsem_energi_data_service_export: Select the sensor that provides export prices from your Energy Data Service integration.
data_description.hsem_energi_data_service_export_min_pric: Set the minimum price for export from your Energy Data Service integration.
data_description.hsem_energi_data_service_import: Select the sensor that provides import prices from your Energy Data Service integration.

energidataservice.description: Select energy data services for HSEM.
energidataservice.title: Energy Data Service Sensors

data.hsem_ev_charger_force_max_discharge_powe: EV Charger Force Max Discharge Power
data.hsem_house_power_includes_ev_charger_pow: House Power Includes EV Charger Power

data_description.hsem_ev_charger_force_max_discharge_powe: Enable this if you want to force a specific maximum discharge power for the Huawei batteries while EV is charging.
data_description.hsem_ev_charger_max_discharge_power: Set the maximum discharge power for the Huawei batteries while EV is charging.
data_description.hsem_ev_charger_power: Select the sensor that measures the power consumption of your EV charger.
data_description.hsem_ev_charger_status: Select the sensor or entity that indicates whether the EV charger is active (e.g., a switch or sensor).
data_description.hsem_house_power_includes_ev_charger_pow: Enable this if the house consumption power sensor already includes the EV charger power consumption.

ev.description: Configure EV Charger settings for HSEM.
ev.title: EV Charger Settings (Optional)

data.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_excess_pv_en: Huawei Batteries Excess PV energy use in TOU
data.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_grid_charge_: Huawei Batteries Grid Charge Cutoff SOC (%)
data.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_state_of_cap: Huawei Batteries State of Capacity Sensor
data.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_tou_charging: Huawei Batteries TOU Charging and Discharging Periods
data.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_working_mode: Huawei Solar Batteries Working Mode Sensor
data.hsem_huawei_solar_inverter_active_power_: Huawei Inverter Active Power Control Sensor

data_description.hsem_batteries_conversion_loss: Specify the percentage of energy loss when charging the battery. This represents the conversion loss, typically between 5% and 10%, which occurs when importing energy from solar panels or the grid to the battery. It is used to calculate the actual time required to charge the battery.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_excess_pv_en: Select the sensor that provides setting for excess PV energy use in TOU periods.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_grid_charge_: Specify the grid charge cutoff SOC percentage for your Huawei batteries.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_maximum_char: Select the sensor that provides the maximum charging power for your Huawei batteries in kilowatts (W).
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_maximum_disc: Select the sensor that provides the maximum discharging power for your Huawei batteries.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_rated_capaci: Select the sensor that provides the total rated capacity of your Huawei batteries in watts (W).
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_state_of_cap: Select the sensor that provides the state of charge (SOC) of your Huawei batteries.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_tou_charging: Select the sensor that defines the Time-of-Use (TOU) charging and discharging periods for your Huawei batteries.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_batteries_working_mode: Select the sensor that indicates the current working mode of your Huawei batteries.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_device_id_inverter_1: Select your primary Huawei inverter device.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_device_id_inverter_2: Select your secondary Huawei inverter device, if applicable.
data_description.hsem_huawei_solar_inverter_active_power_: Select the sensor that controls the active power output of your Huawei inverter.

huawei_solar.description: Configure the working mode for Huawei solar batteries.
huawei_solar.title: Huawei Solar Sensors

data_description.hsem_months_winter: Select the months that should be considered as Winter/Spring for the seasonal working mode adjustments. You can select multiple months.

months.description: Configure the months that are considered as Winter/Spring. During these months, the system will prioritize charging the batteries from grid energy to ensure sufficient battery levels during periods of lower solar production. Remaining months will be considered as Summer/Autum months.
months.title: Winter/Spring Months

data_description.hsem_house_consumption_power: Select the sensor that measures your house's total power consumption.
data_description.hsem_solar_production_power: Select the sensor that measures the power generated by your solar panels.

data.hsem_solcast_pv_forecast_forecast_likeli: Solcast PV Forecast Preferred forecast likelihood to use

data_description.hsem_solcast_pv_forecast_forecast_likeli: Select the preferred forecast likelihood to use for Solcast PV forecasts.
data_description.hsem_solcast_pv_forecast_forecast_today: Select the sensor that provides today's PV production forecast from Solcast.
data_description.hsem_solcast_pv_forecast_forecast_tomorr: Select the sensor that provides tomorrow's PV production forecast from Solcast.

data_description.device_name: Enter a unique name for this device.
data_description.hsem_read_only: Enable this option to set the integration to read-only mode, preventing it from sending commands to devices.
data_description.hsem_update_interval: The update interval in minutes for the working mode sensor.

data_description.hsem_house_consumption_energy_weight_14d: Specify the weight percentage for the house consumption energy over the last 14 days.
data_description.hsem_house_consumption_energy_weight_1d: Specify the weight percentage for the house consumption energy over the last 1 day.
data_description.hsem_house_consumption_energy_weight_3d: Specify the weight percentage for the house consumption energy over the last 3 days.
data_description.hsem_house_consumption_energy_weight_7d: Specify the weight percentage for the house consumption energy over the last 7 days.

weighted_values.description: Configure the weighted values for house consumption energy to estimate your average power usage. The system calculates the average consumption for each hour over 1, 3, 7, and 14 days. These averages are then weighted to provide a combined, weighted estimate. This approach helps to smooth out anomalies, such as unusually high consumption on a single day due to low prices, and provides a reliable prediction of your expected power usage in specific time intervals (e.g., between 16:00 and 17:00).
weighted_values.title: Weighted Values
